title: Historical Canon Migration
value: Migrate legacy archives from Arweave into Press so all history becomes voteable, monetizable, and provable under one Court + Council policy stack.

title: Proof-of-Origin Hardening
value: Preserve original Arweave TxID as immutable provenance while adding Press-layer signatures, votes, and co-author royalty primitives.

title: Outlet Onboarding Acceleration
value: Outlets can import entire existing libraries quickly, then progressively enrich them with Press licensing, syndication, and marketplace distribution.

title: Court-Grade Evidence Linking
value: Imported articles can be referenced as evidence objects in Court cases with official import flags and anti-tamper guarantees.

title: Unified Monetization + Rights Sales
value: Arweave content becomes eligible for Press tipping, co-author splits, rights sales, and syndication marketplaces—features Arweave does not natively provide.
